ygData.messageBody:
rumored to be a named pallidan at the pallidan camp

sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 12:43 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...

From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

Unfortunately, I don't know. A rare spawn in the Rathe
Mountains, I think. I
was given mine by a higher level bard.
